snippet: France’s Socialist government introduced legislation on Wednesday that would give the police more power to arrest people who travel to camps for training in conflict zones like Pakistan and Afghanistan.
abstract: France’s Socialist government tables legislation that would give police more power to arrest people who travel to camps for training in conflict zones like Pakistan and Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: France’s Socialist government introduced legislation on Wednesday that would give the police more power to arrest people who travel to camps for training in conflict zones like Pakistan and Afghanistan.

headline.print_headline: France: Government Puts Terrorism Legislation on Hold
